timeline.message:
Debug remaining aggregation problems

Avoid having useless "IsSoTrx=false; => set IsEdiEnabled to false" entries in the async-workpackage-log

Debug remaining aggregation problems

InvoiceCandidateEnqueuer: actual fix - set DateToInvoice and DateAcct *before* the enqeuing, if specified via process params
Also:
* TimeUtil: deprecate TimeUtil.asTimestamp(LocalDate) because it assumes that the server's local timezone is always the correct one
* DocTypeId: fix incorrect lombo annotation
* IInvoiceCandBL.getDateToInvoice() - now returns LocalDate instead of timestamp
* InvoiceCandBL - change *internal* stuff to work with Timestamp and not LocalDate..to avoid the need for conversions when stuff is going right from one timestamp column to another one
* IInvoiceCandDAO - changed some methods to work with LocalDate instead of timestamp
* InvoiceCandidateQuery - change type of dateToInvoice from timestamp to LocalDate, and add orgId (optional, unless dateToInvoice is set)

Debug remaining aggregation problems

do method renames that we already have in master, to have the code more similar

Debug remaining aggregation problems

add AD_PInstance and AD_Process_ID MDC!

Debug remaining aggregation problems

solve unit test problem
https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/6096

avoid not-really-important mettasge in async-WP log

metasfresh/metasfresh#6096

timeline.author: metas-ts
metas-ts
